snippet: Dinamo Zagreb midfielder Arijan Ademi has been barred for four years because he failed a drug test after a Champions League match against Arsenal in September.
abstract: Dinamo Zagreb midfielder Arijan Ademi is given four-year suspension for failing drug test after Dinamo beat Arsenal 2-1 in Champions League match; club will appeal on behalf of Ademi, who maintains he is innocent.
lead_paragraph: Dinamo Zagreb midfielder Arijan Ademi has been barred for four years because he failed a drug test after a Champions League match against Arsenal in September.
